itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Pulitzer Prize-nominated journalist Marshall Allen to discuss his new book, "Never Pay the First Bill: And Other Ways to Fight the Health Care System and Win". Allen explains how the U.S. healthcare system is set up to screw its customers over and how to beat (and fix) the system.
